# Opening Sentences {-}

Opening sentences are a simple declaration to the congregation, taken from scripture, to open the service with a reminder of why we are gathered together.

### Examples {-}

> Our help is in the name of the LORD, Who made heaven and earth.
> 
> --- Psalm 124:8

> The LORD is in His holy temple. Let all the earth be silent before Him. | Habakkuk 2:20

---
